item.title: SWN
item.description: score:-48 Chances: The longer-term bull case for natural gas rests on expanding U.S. exports SWN Announces 2023 Earnings with Strong Cash Flow Despite Lower Commodity Prices Southwestern Energy (SWN) possessed the right combination of key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report Risks: Front-month gas futures for March delivery rose 11.
